Package io.crums.sldg.packs

Class PathPackBuilder

java.lang.Object
io.crums.sldg.packs.PathPackBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.crums.io.Serial, PathBag
public class PathPackBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements PathBag, io.crums.io.Serial
A mutable PathBag whose serial form can be loaded as an immutable PathPack.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • addBeaconRow

      public boolean addBeaconRow​(long rowNumber, long utc)
      Adds the given beacon row and its UTC max time. Recall a beacon row contains the root hash of a Merkle tree published at crums.io as its input. This method does rudimentary checks on the consistency of the input arguments. (This is just an opportunity to fail garbage data before it fails downstream.)
      Parameters:
      rowNumber - ≥ 1
      utc - the advertised time for the beacon (here the UTC of the youngest crum as a leaf node in a crums.io Merkle tree
      Returns:
      true iff the given beacon row was added

    • addDeclaredPath

      public boolean addDeclaredPath​(PathInfo path)
      Adds the given path declaration, if it doesn't already exist.

      Note adding n of these takes n2 operations. We don't expect that many declared paths (our file format maxes out at 64k), but even if usage ever nears that magnitude, we'll need to consider sorting this in order improve performance.

      Returns:
      true iff the given path was added

    • addPathPack

      public int addPathPack​(PathPack pathPack)
      Adds all the data from the given pathPack to this instance. When invoked on an empty instance, fewer checks are necessary and is consequently more efficient.
      Returns:
      the number of objects added (path declarations and beacons)
